body_html:
This change is good -- the docs were clearly out of date.

However, the actual behavior of batch_norm is a bit puzzling to me: If fused is None or True, it tries to use fused batch norm. I would have expected

fused=None: Try fused, fall back on regular if not possible to use fused
fused=True: Try fused, if not possible, raise
fused=False: Don't try fused.

@chrisying, do you have context on this (just calling you because you're in the comments)
